articles.title: Bain Is Said to Draw Chinese Bidders for $4 Billion Data Centers
articles.summary: The China data center business owned by Bain Capital’s Chindata Group Holdings Ltd. has drawn interest from local bidders seeking to expand in the sector to tap a boom in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Bain Is Said to Draw Chinese Bidders for $4 Billion Data Centers
articles.translated_summary: The China data center business owned by Bain Capital’s Chindata Group Holdings Ltd. has drawn interest from local bidders seeking to expand in the sector to tap a boom in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Volkswagen production gets AI boost in renewed Amazon deal
articles.summary: Volkswagen has renewed its 'factory cloud' partnership as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to reduce costs.
articles.translated_title: Volkswagen production gets AI boost in renewed Amazon deal
articles.translated_summary: Volkswagen has renewed its 'factory cloud' partnership as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to reduce costs.

articles.title: South Korea to boost budget spending in bid to spur AI-led growth
articles.summary: South Korea's government plans to raise budget spending for next year by the steepest pace in four years as the country's new president seeks to spur economic growth through a policy of boosting investment in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: South Korea to boost budget spending in bid to spur AI-led growth
articles.translated_summary: South Korea's government plans to raise budget spending for next year by the steepest pace in four years as the country's new president seeks to spur economic growth through a policy of boosting investment in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Beijing Sets Ambitious Targets for Nationwide AI Integration Over 10 Years
articles.summary: Beijing has unveiled its most aggressive artificial intelligence targets yet, aiming for near-universal adoption within a decade.
articles.translated_title: Beijing Sets Ambitious Targets for Nationwide AI Integration Over 10 Years
articles.translated_summary: Beijing has unveiled its most aggressive artificial intelligence targets yet, aiming for near-universal adoption within a decade.

articles.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
articles.summary: Investors are largely seeing Nvidia earnings as a validation that the artificial intelligence boom has legs. Fueled with fresh optimism, the S&P 500 reached new heights Thursday.
articles.translated_title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session

articles.title: S&P 500, Dow score record high closes as Nvidia results buttress AI rally
articles.summary: The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average notched record high closes on Thursday after Nvidia’s quarterly report fell short of investors’ high expectations but confirmed that spending related to artificial intelligence infrastructure remains strong

articles.title: YouTube’s Third Act Stars AI and TikTok
articles.summary: The once-scrappy US startup is now a 20-year-old giant. In its third decade, it faces the promise and peril of artificial intelligence—and the rise of a Chinese rival.
articles.translated_title: YouTube’s Third Act Stars AI and TikTok

articles.title: Stocks hit all-time highs as US economy grows faster than expected
articles.summary: Stocks hit all-time highs after the US economy grew faster than expected during the latest quarter, boosted by strong consumer spending and big investments in artificial intelligence that eased concerns about the effects of Trump's tariffs.
articles.translated_title: Stocks hit all-time highs as US economy grows faster than expected
articles.translated_summary: Stocks hit all-time highs after the US economy grew faster than expected during the latest quarter, boosted by strong consumer spending and big investments in artificial intelligence that eased concerns about the effects of Trump's tariffs.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI launches Grok-Code-Fast-1, a free agentic coding model to rival OpenAI and Microsoft
articles.summary: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is moving into the coding space. On Thursday, the company released a new agentic coding model called grok-code-fast-1, a tool it describes as “speedy and economical.” The release marks xAI’s push into one of the most competitive frontiers in AI: building assistants that can write and manage code. The
